entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
